answer: Current X-ray spectral analysis of Seyfert 2 galaxies extends previous work by revealing complex spectra and motivating further investigation into the nature of these galaxies (astro-ph/0104061).
explanation: This paper presents an X-ray spectral analysis of a sample of Seyfert 2 galaxies, finding complex spectra and suggesting that some objects may lack intrinsic absorption, which motivates further investigation.
evidence_quote: The X-ray spectra of our Seyfert 2 galaxies are complex
